languages.text: {n}Взгляд Маражая приклеивается к несчастному со вскрытой черепной коробкой. Угол рта ксеноса дергается вверх, искажая худое лицо зверской ухмылкой.{/n}
{n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Маражая приклеивается к несчастному со вскрытой черепной коробкой. Угол рта ксеноса дергается вверх, искажая худое лицо зверской ухмылкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who had his skull carved open. The corner of his mouth is twitching, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光紧紧盯着那个被切开头颅的可怜人。他的嘴角抽搐着，拉长了苍白的脸，露出了扭曲的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的目光紧紧盯着那个被切开头颅的可怜人。他的嘴角抽搐着，拉长了苍白的脸，露出了扭曲的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの目は、頭蓋骨を割られた哀れな魂に釘付けになっていた。その頭蓋骨は切り開かれている。デュカーリの口角がピクピクと動き、やせ細った顔にゆがんだ笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの目は、頭蓋骨を割られた哀れな魂に釘付けになっていた。その頭蓋骨は切り開かれている。デュカーリの口角がピクピクと動き、やせ細った顔にゆがんだ笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tiene los ojos clavados en el desdichado al que le han abierto el cráneo. La comisura de su boca se curva, dibujando en su rostro demacrado una sonrisa retorcida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai tiene los ojos clavados en el desdichado al que le han abierto el cráneo. La comisura de su boca se curva, dibujando en su rostro una sonrisa retorcida.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Augen können sich nicht von der armen Seele lösen, deren Schädel aufgeschnitten wurde. Die Mundwinkel des Drukhari zucken, und auf seinem dürren Gesicht macht sich ein krankes Grinsen breit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Augen können sich nicht von der armen Seele lösen, deren Schädel aufgeschnitten wurde. Seine Mundwinkel zucken und auf seinem dürren Gesicht macht sich ein krankes Grinsen breit.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Marazhai est fixé sur le malheureux au crâne ouvert. Le coin de la bouche du Drukhari tressaille, puis un rictus cruel apparaît sur son visage hâve.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Marazhai est fixé sur le malheureux au crâne ouvert. Le coin de sa bouche tressaille, puis un rictus cruel apparaît sur son visage hâve.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri; kafatası açılmış, acınası adama kilitleniyor. Drukhari'nin dudaklarının ucu titriyor, zayıf yüzünde çarpık bir sırıtış peyda oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes are locked on the wretched soul who has had his skull cracked open. The corner of the Drukhari's mouth twitches, stretching his gaunt face into a twisted grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, kafatası açılmış acınası adama kilitlenmiş durumda. Drukhari'nin dudaklarının köşesi titriyor ve zayıf yüzünde çarpık bir sırıtış peyda oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
